response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only its worth but also the exclusivity and the potential it holds for you.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it represents a fair compromise between its value and what you stand to gain. Should you choose to accept, you will be making a strategic investment that could yield significant returns over time.

Should you need any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide additional details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
